```{r}
library(STRINGdb)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
library(DiSNEP)
data("s0")
data("adjacency")
data("signals")
```

```{r}
se=diffus_matrix(s0,adjacency,alpha=0.75,iter=10, difference=1e-6)
se_post=post_process(se,percent=0.9)
res=diffus_vec(signals,se_post,type="pvalue", beta=0.75, iter=10, difference=1e-6, top=100)
```
